name: Auto Memory
description: Automatically extracts important facts and stores them in LanceDB with local embeddings for semantic search

enabled.description: Enable or disable the auto-memory plugin

messageThreshold.description: Number of messages after which to analyze and write to memory

minImportance.description: Minimum importance threshold (0-1) for facts to be saved

notificationEnabled.description: Whether to send a notification when memory is updated

notificationMessage.description: Message to send as notification when memory is updated

maxMessagesContext.description: Maximum number of recent messages to include in the analysis context

lancedb.description: LanceDB configuration (required - plugin only works with embeddings)

embedding.description: Local embedding configuration (required - plugin only works with embeddings)

modelPath.description: Path to embedding model (GGUF format or HuggingFace URI)
